name: Coastal Skies Aero Club
about: Coastal Skies Aero Club is a premier flying school in the Galveston/Houston area, dedicated to uniting pilots and flight instructors in a fun, friendly environment. We offer a large and diverse fleet of aircraft, including Piper Arrow, Piper Cherokee, and Piper Archer II models, for both flight training and recreational flying. Our club provides a comprehensive range of services, including aircraft rental and professional flight instruction, catering to the needs of aspiring pilots and seasoned aviators alike. With a focus on safety, quality training, and community building, Coastal Skies Aero Club is the ideal place to pursue your aviation dreams.
